original_text:
Even though you offer me your burnt offerings and grain offerings,
    I will not accept them;
and the peace offerings of your fattened animals,
    I will not look upon them.
korean_text: 너희가 내게 번제나 소제를 드릴지라도 내가 받지 아니할 것이요 너희의 살진 희생의 화목제도 내가 돌아보지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: Even though you offer me your burnt offerings and grain offerings,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 번제와 소제물을 나에게 드린다 할지라도,

sentences.original_text: and the peace offerings of your fattened animals,
I will not look upon them.
